title: How to Unlock the Fire Department Window in Epic Mickey

steps.headline: In Ostown, press A when you are near Animatronics Goofy's head.
steps.description: He will ask you to find the rest of his parts.

steps.headline: You can either try to find his parts scattered around Tomorrow City, or earn E-Tickets and buy them.
steps.description: With all the Animatronics Characters, in parts of the game, in the places you are supposed to search, and more, someone will give a part to you. To buy the parts, they cost 1,000 E-Tickets each. Anyway, get all his parts. Don't freak out when there is only one arm to buy. That's normal.

steps.headline: Once you have all his parts, go to Ostown, press "A" next to Goofy, and he will be put back together.
Then, he will reward you with a key to Ortensia's house, the pink one with hearts in Ostown.
steps.description: Then, press "A" next to the door of that house. It will be unlocked, then go in. Walk to the back, you will see a locket, pick it up, then go back to mean street.

steps.headline: In mean street, if you go in the museum, and they ask you to give the locket to them, don't.
steps.description: Go to Oswald and press "A". He may not talk about it at first, but keep pressing "A" until he notices the locket. Give the locket to him.

steps.headline: As a reward, he will give you a key to the fire department window.
steps.description: After you press a and unlock it, go in for a surprise!

text: In Ostown, press A when you are near Animatronics Goofy's head. He will ask you to find the rest of his parts. You can either try to find his parts scattered around Tomorrow City, or earn E-Tickets and buy them. With all the Animatronics Characters, in parts of the game, in the places you are supposed to search, and more, someone will give a part to you. To buy the parts, they cost 1,000 E-Tickets each. Anyway, get all his parts. Don't freak out when there is only one arm to buy. That's normal. Once you have all his parts, go to Ostown, press "A" next to Goofy, and he will be put back together.  Then, he will reward you with a key to Ortensia's house, the pink one with hearts in Ostown. Then, press "A" next to the door of that house. It will be unlocked, then go in. Walk to the back, you will see a locket, pick it up, then go back to mean street. In mean street, if you go in the museum, and they ask you to give the locket to them, don't. Go to Oswald and press "A". He may not talk about it at first, but keep pressing "A" until he notices the locket. Give the locket to him. As a reward, he will give you a key to the fire department window. After you press a and unlock it, go in for a surprise!
